body_html:
Hi to all,

I have seen the implementation of the seq2seq loss and it seems that it doesn't ignore possible padding values that can be used during training to make sequences of the same length. However, these values should not be considered in the loss function. Am I wrong?

Thank you for your great work @alrojo. I hope that this pull request will be merged as soon as possible :)

Best regards,
Alessandro
